snippet.title: Bounty Arms iOS Gameplay 'N Action
snippet.description:
From the makers of Bladeslinger comes Bounty Arms, another deluxe 3D adventure game. In the case of Bounty Arms, it's a side scrolling annihilation fest where you're just trying to destroy everything in sight as you traverse the levels. There are 10 expansive levels to battle your way through with forking pathways, all kinds of enemy types, and ornate 3D visuals. You have three characters to choose from, and each has their own weapon set and special ability. Speaking of weapons there are some outlandish items to use including giant hammers, firework rocket launchers, dragon shotguns, and more.

Bounty Arms ($4.99, Universal) is a deluxe new addition to the App Store that delivers an over the top style that you can see 'N Action in our gameplay video below.
